resources.string: A cozy Italian trattoria serving authentic pasta, wood-fired pizzas, and fine wines. Perfect for romantic dinners or family gatherings.
Fresh oysters, grilled salmon, and seafood platters in a nautical-themed setting. Known for its daily catches and waterfront views.
Sizzling steaks, ribs, and kebabs cooked over an open flame. Lively atmosphere with live music on weekends.
Plant-based dishes made from locally sourced ingredients. Try their signature avocado burger or cashew cheesecake.
Elegant sushi bar offering omakase menus, sashimi platters, and sake pairings. Minimalist décor with a Zen garden.
Gourmet burgers with craft beers and loaded fries. Features a build-your-own-burger bar and retro arcade games.
Rustic pub with 50+ craft beers on tap and hearty German-inspired dishes like schnitzel and pretzels.
Homemade cakes, macarons, and artisanal coffee in a pastel-colored café. Famous for its rainbow crepe cakes.
Premium dry-aged steaks and Wagyu beef cuts. Dim lighting and leather booths create a classic steakhouse vibe.
Spicy Thai curries, Vietnamese pho, and dim sum served in a lantern-lit space. Don’t miss their dragon-themed cocktails.
State-of-the-art multiplex with 15 screens, Dolby Atmos sound, and VIP lounges. Hosts frequent film festivals.
Giant IMAX screen with 3D blockbusters and documentaries. Features a space-themed lobby with astronaut exhibits.
Indie films, foreign cinema, and director Q&A nights. Intimate setting with vintage film reels on display.
Nostalgic single-screen theater showing classic movies from the 80s and 90s. Includes a retro candy bar.
Comfy sofas and blankets for a home-like experience. Order pizzas and cocktails while watching cult favorites.
Lush green space with walking trails, paddleboat rentals, and open-air concerts in summer. Iconic fountain at the center.
Over 5,000 plant species, tropical greenhouses, and guided tours. The rose garden is a photo hotspot.
Thrill rides, roller coasters, and carnival games for all ages. Nighttime light shows during holidays.
Wave pools, lazy rivers, and water slides. Tropical-themed with cabana rentals and swim-up bars.
Serene pine forest with hiking trails and birdwatching spots. Camping allowed in designated areas.
Open-air gallery with 50+ modern sculptures. Free admission and guided art walks every Sunday.
Massive mall with 300+ stores, an ice rink, and a rooftop observatory. The food court offers global cuisines.
Upscale shopping with luxury brands, a spa, and a glass-domed atrium. Hosts fashion shows monthly.
Discount designer outlets with year-round sales. Outdoor layout with food trucks and picnic areas.
Beachfront mall with surf shops, seafood restaurants, and sunset views from the terrace.
Exclusive boutiques selling jewelry, haute couture, and limited-edition sneakers. Champagne bar on-site.
Exhibits on regional history, from prehistoric fossils to WWII artifacts. Free admission on Tuesdays.
Avant-garde installations and rotating exhibits by emerging artists. Interactive digital art zone.
Hands-on science experiments, planetarium shows, and a giant Tesla coil demonstration.
Timeline of the city’s growth, including a replica 19th-century street and vintage tram rides.
Permanent collection of Renaissance paintings and temporary exhibits by contemporary photographers.
Tanks, fighter jets, and military uniforms. Kids can climb into a decommissioned helicopter.
